/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, a body of water can be seen, adding a serene element to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a gray facade, its modern architecture contrasting with the natural elements of the scene. The image is a beautiful blend of urban and natural elements, showcasing the unique charm of Beijing.
